name: To Retire Upon the Perch
description: Complete Trailblaze Mission "A Dragon Gallant, Its Ocean Distant" and clear Forgotten Hall: Memory of Xianzhou Stage 1 to obtain the character Yukong
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Participation Requirement ◆
Complete the Trailblaze Mission in "Xianzhou Luofu - A Dragon Gallant, Its Ocean Distant" to unlock new memories in the Forgotten Hall, "The Voyage of Navis Astriger."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Clear "Forgotten Hall: Memory of Xianzhou Stage 1" to obtain the 4-star character Yukong (Harmony: Imaginary).
